product_overview: Lila Chakra is a Telegram Mini App designed to digitally adapt the ancient Indian game of self-discovery 'Lila' using AI-driven move interpretation. It features real-time theming support and an interactive game interface built with modern web technologies.
core_goals: Enable users to play the Lila Chakra game within Telegram seamlessly.
Provide AI-driven interpretation of game moves to enhance user understanding and engagement.
Support dynamic light and dark theming across the app interface and charts.
Ensure high code quality and maintainability using modern frontend standards and testing.
Facilitate localization with support for multiple languages, defaulting to English.
Seamlessly integrate with backend APIs for game state management and data persistence.
key_features: Telegram Mini App integration supporting in-app gameplay and interaction.
Dynamic CSS variable theming for light and dark modes replacing hardcoded styles.
Reactive chart components that adapt automatically to theme changes for better visual consistency.
Comprehensive state management using Pinia to handle game moves and state.
Localization support using Vue i18n with easy-to-extend translation files.
Unit testing and continuous linting/formatting ensuring code reliability.
Production ready build setup with environment configuration for deployment.
Structured and well-documented project architecture with modular components and services.
user_flow_summary: User opens the Lila Chakra game within Telegram Mini App environment.
User starts a new game and rolls dice to make moves across game cells.
User receives AI interpretation and insights for each move they make.
Game state is updated and stored via API calls to backend services.
User interface responds dynamically to theme changes switching between light and dark modes.
Charts and analytics update reactively reflecting current game state and user performance.
User can switch languages as needed through localization support.
Upon game completion, users can review move history and AI commentary.
validation_criteria: All game logic and state transitions conform to defined rules and pass unit tests.
Theme switching correctly updates all UI components and charts without visual glitches.
Localization strings are properly loaded and displayed based on user language selection.
API integration with backend services is fully functional and error handled.
Code meets linting standards with no critical issues and is properly formatted.
Production build runs without errors and is correctly minified and optimized.
User interface is responsive and compatible with Telegram Mini App constraints.
Documentation is complete and accurately reflects the current state of the project.

features.name: CSS Variable Theming
features.description: Implemented CSS variables for app-wide theming to support both light and dark modes dynamically, replacing hardcoded color values in SCSS and components.

features.name: Reactive Chart Theming
features.description: Refactored IndexPage chart configuration to be reactive to theme changes, ensuring charts display correct colors in both light and dark modes.
